name: ArsonVille
description: A calming, relaxing, yet slightly disturbing casual game in which you attempt to completely burn down a village.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higher Processor: Pentium Dual Core 2.1 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 100 MB available space Additional Notes: May work on lesser spec machines

reviews.review_text: Fantastic Premise. i LOVE burning villages. I wish there was some better level design though. Technically the game is infinite as it is procedurally generated, but figuring out procedurally generated puzzles is not as fun as say, having a little min campaign. Maybe tell us who the people are in the cabins that we are burning down?  Anyways, Check it out.          YouTubeâ„¢ Video:  ArsonVille - Burninating the Countryside
